EXTRACTED VALUE: The best thing about the gameplay is that it's all about reflex and intuition --accessible to all, but hard to master online competitive play.
It is by far one of the scariest games of all time, and its innovative combat system and captivating storyline make this game one hell of a ride.
And while it might be visually unassuming, Braid offers players an experience (and a message about life) that few games have ever dared to offer.
This is not a zombie stop-gap until "Resident Evil 5" is out; this is an actual game that you do not want to miss...****ing great fun!
Controls and presentation in Bad Company are phenomenal. It is incredibly easy to switch between weapons and items.
